content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a case between two parties referred to as lo and oi lo filed a lawsuit demanding the division of joint property and oi filed a counterclaim for the same the court decided to dismiss the claim and counterclaim partially and divide the common property between lo and oi they listed the specific items that each party will keep as their sole property the court also awarded financial compensation to oi in the amount of 2902 euros and 50 cents the costs of the proceedings will be borne by both parties the court decision can be appealed within 30 days the court heard arguments and counterarguments regarding the division of property and financial matters the court assessed the value of disputed items such as surfing equipment a game console and a tool kit based on sales advertisements and witness testimonies the court also addressed disputes over a car trampolines and a loan agreement the court made decisions on the ownership and value of these items the court also considered the division of money collected during the marriage and the establishment of a limited company the court made judgments on these matters as well the court determined the financial amount of procedural costs and decided that the costs will be borne by the parties

metadata.cost: Each party covers own procedural costs, unspecified amounts
